I Got a New Journal!
Jen Did it all Up :)

http://www.livejournal.com/users/xmeaganx44/
FRIENDS ONLY!!

Monday, School.. Came home and hung out with Ashlee and Rachel! <33 We had a lotta fun! A few people for pranked-- Hehe! Than they left and i just went to bed!

Tuesday, School.. Came home.. Than my mommy made me go to the grocery store with her.. Than Went to Excerise Clasessss:)! Went to Rachels.. We put on self tanner.. haha, lets just say BAD idea!! Than came home and went to bed!

Today, School.. Came Home No School Tomorrow :-D!!! Gotta Tutor Later $$$!!! My Daddy offered me a job, $20/HouR! Hells yes! But I told him I'd get back to him!

So.. Im grounded for about a month... But its not that bad im still allowed to do everything except go on the computer and i got my cell phone taken away!! So i gotta sneak online before my rents get home from work! lol! Oh, and if you need to talk call the home phone! Weekend was about normal.. Nothing too exciting! Yeah... 


<3 Meagan


:)him...

So yesterday i didnt end up goin to the boat show... Me n my mom ended up running all around town!! My mom is a funny character i must say! Than at like 6 ish Justin Ashlee and Erica came and got me! We went to Harsens Island... Whata Crazy Island! We got chased by a BIG truck!! And on the ferry on the way back me n ash were standing outta the moon roof dancing...Than we went to McDonalds and met up with their friend Greg.. We than decided to go to Target... It was fun!! Me n Ashlee had the security guard following us!Ahh!! Than we left and went to the NB park and played Tag.. dude why dont big kids play that game? Then we went Ice Skating. uhh kinda... Than it was to Ericas house to drop her offf... Than she followed us and we drove around madly trying to lose her, eventually we did! We drove into the cementary across from the hathaway house and there was a random car just parked there with no one in it.. weird... So than we went to Koney and ate some food! Than they droped me off.. It was a fun night :):)!! 

Today... Softball at like 12 prolly stay till 3ish.. Than idk.. Gotta start reading that book for the book report.. oh anyone no when that speech is now due? 

<3 Meagan

Hmm... Lets See..

Wednsday... School.. Babysat with Rachel...

Thursday... babysat till 3... Than went to the Mall with Ashlee!! Than Came home and went to Rachels.. Sam was over there.. We went up to preimer *Forgetting it was a thursday* and did about nothing..Walked to Jurelles...

Friday...Babysat till 3... Came home showered and got ready than went over rachels and hung out with her sam n shaylla( I miss you soo much! Def gonna start hanging out again, although u are sucha bad influence ;) lol) !! We decided to go to the movies.. Than Anton picked us up and we went to Shaylla's Brother house... Was a fun night with the girls!! 

Today.. Woke up at like 7*30, no fucking idea why... Sat there in rachels basement till they got up... Than came home.. was gonna go to the boat show with my dad bc i feel bad i havent gone with him all week... But idk what imma do later... 

<3 Meagan

Its def. Time for an update :)

Well last weekend i must say i had a very good time up north with ashlee!! *Cannot wait to do it again girl*!

School Blows, but what else is new?

Friday-- After school hung out with rachel.. Than me rach bry femi n tony went to see boogyman! It was scary! Went to rachels than came home...

Saturday-- Went shopping with my mom all day... Than drove out to algonac to pick up her friend.. Than i had to babysit from 6-12 $$:)!!

Today-- Goin shopping for my birthday *Which is Tuesday*!! My sister is comin over later tonight to gimme my presents!! I think Larry forgot it was my birthday, but hey i always get more when he does bc he feels bad!!


What the hell.. Every other school gets all week off for winter break, but of course AB has only 2 days off!!! Which i have to babysit both days!! But hey im making $80! so i guess its alrite...


Ang Sorry we couldnt hang out this weekend.. Def will again though soon, just gimme a call!!!


<3 Meagan

MEAGAN
M is for Mystical

A is for Animated

What Does Your Name Mean?

Friday...
After School I had to drive with Crystal! Than I came home and ate and than i went to Ashlees!! We watched Monk and than i did her and heathers hair.. We we gonna go to the bball game but than we decided to go bowling with rach n devin! It was fun!! I seen kevin, havent seen him in forever!! Than i went back to Rach's!!! Than i left and went to Joes till 1! Came home went 2 bed!

Saturday...
Well it snowed all day and my mom wouldnt lemme do anything so i cleaned and rearranged my whole damn room! It took almost all day! Than i went and rented Napolean Dynamite and went to Ashlees again! We watched it than played DDR! I must say I totally blow at that game!!! Very uncoordinated! Than i came home talked on the phone and went to bed!

Today...
Got up at like 11ish.. Sat around.. Talked to Mike for a while.. My mom wont lemme do anything today either because of the roads!! grr.. So i have been sitting around the house all day... 


<3 Meagan

Okay, I think its time for an update!!
*Nothing really new lately.. Just Basketball everyday!!

Well I haven't updated in a while so I decided I would!! 

Friday- School. No More Basketball Practice, our season ended Thursday!

*December*

Today..
Woke up, called brian and he was already up. we decided we were goin to go to the mall so we called ashlee and her and chris wanted to go.. so at like 2 we went to the mall.. I got a shirt from aero, a belt from pac sun, 4 pairs of earrings from claires, a shirt from AE, and ordered the extensions for my bracelt brian got me:)!! Than we left and went to Taco Bell, I didnt have any $$ so bry gave me his taco. Than we took Chris and Ashlee home and brian came over for a little bit...Now im sitting at home bored.. like usual...

Today.. 
Woke up around 10*30 and called to wake bry up. We were suppose to go ice skating with ash n chris but open skate was from 2-3*50 and bry had to work at 4 so that didnt happen. So bry came and picked me n ash up and went to Target and Arbys.. Than he dropped us off and i came home and took a nap.. Got up and me n ma went to Khols. I took 2 pairs of jeans back bc they didnt fit and i got 3 more pairs of jeans and a shirt.  Than I came home and took the Behrens there presents.. And recieved ours. They got me this really adorable pink outfit and a $25 gift card to fashion bug.. Than i came home and downloaded a new ringtone :)! Playboys of the southwestern world! I <3 that song!! Me ash chris and bry were all suppose to go to the movies at 10 but bry has to work at 10 so now just me n bry are goin to go if he can get off work early.. 

Tomorrow.. Goin to the mall with ash n bry :):) these gift cards and Money are burning a hole in my pocket!!! 

<33 Meagan

Merry Christmas!

Yesterday-Everyone came over and we had our Rekowski polish christmas.. it was really fun, although the food was nasty, as usual! But it was fun, hung out with my cousins steph, jeff, ash, nicki, nick, mark, and danny.  I got to open my presents from Carrie, Larry, Aunt Cin and Uncle Paul steph Jeff and Ash! I got a $25 gift card to Claires, Refills*sweetPea* for my air freshner, These cute socks with "m" on them, $50 bank gift card, this awesome perfume and lotion, body wash and lotion. Oh nana Gave me $10 :)!

Today-My parents came upstairs and woke me n mike up, it was funny mike feel asleep by the toilet! But we came down and opened our presents, *goin to Fl was part of my x-mas present* i got shoes a hoodie  2 shirts from AE, 3 pairs of Jeans. Stealing Christmas Dvd and some other one i forget what it was. The Brad Praisly cd,a calander. A $60 Band Gift Card, Lots of Undies socks and Bras.  This really cute bracelet:). Candy lip gloss and more Refills*cocnut lime* for my airfreshner. Got to open my Christmas Cards my Gramps gave me $25 and my uncle tom gave me $25!

Brian came over, he got me a shit from AE, a purse and this bracelet. Omg its soo cute. It has a heart and on it it says Meagan on the front and Love Brian on the back. Omg its adorable!  Than His mom got me the matching Scarf, Mittens, and Hat from AE, there are soo cute!!

I <33 Everything i got:)


But I got my hair cut, i have bangs:-/... i dont no if i like it or not...


<3 Meagan

Ashlee gave me my x-mas present! Omg she got me 2 pairs of earrings and a necklace they are soo cute:) I love em!!Last night we went to Brys hockey game.. they tied 2-2! It was fun wit Ashlee!!


Today was finally our last day before break!!:)!! 
1*Talked to Jess n Laura
2*Watched the rest of Shrek II in Espanol.
3*Made christmas cards that had to do w. biology!
4* Took a quiz
5* Took a table quiz.. it was easy! 
6*Checked our tests. Talked.

(We got our progress reports, i got 3 B's, kinda scared to show the rents! But hey i gotta A+ in math:))

--Sammy made me a scarf for christmas and its absolutely adorable!! Im so excited to wear it!! Thanks so much Sammy! <33

Came home feel asleep. Than woke up and wrapped some christmas gifts! I tutored the girl down the street. its so great $20/hour! Than Brian came over with his new car :)! Its pretty sweet! We went to McDonalds and he bought me a Hot Fudge Sunday, I've been craving one forever bc like everyday Jenna talks about em!! Than came home and my rents left, my brother left, and brian left, so im here alone:(!! But Bry is comin back around 9*30 ish..


<33 Meagan

.Weekend.

Friday- School=Sucks Balls! Than came home and brian came over! We cleaned my room :):)!! Than we went and got Ashlee and went to his Hockey Game :)! Twas fun, although they lost! Than we were goin to stay for the AB hockey game but we decided not to because we didnt really see anybody.. So than we went back to Brys and watched Malibu's Most wanted.. We all fell alseep tho! Then Bry took us home, he called me when he got home than fell asleep on the telephone!

Saturday- Woke up from my mom yelling at me to come help bring in groceries! So i went and helped her than we left and went shopping!! Than we got home around 12*30ish and unloaded that car again.. Than sat around and ate Pizza :-p! Than i took a shower and got ready! Than we went to my cousins grad party (she graduated from college)!! All the fam was there, just chilled around wit em!! Arlene was soo drunk and she was like telling my mom i was experience and like tryin to get me in trouble!! She is a bitch!! Than she all tried to like be my best friend!! Hope she doesnt come over on x-mas!!! Than me steph mike jeff n ashley went for a drive.. it was pretty funny! Than came back and ate and hung around!! Than we went back to my house and just hung around..

Today-woke up, cleaned the house! someone kept calling my damn phone last night at like 4 am with a blocked number and they wouldnt say anything!!So finally after like the 10th time i just turned my phone off!! But anyways Bry has a hockey game tonight but idk if imma go er not... :-/.. Ash cant go :(!! Yeh.. 

*Meagan

Havent updated in a while! Nothing really has been new. Softball practices started i went yesterday and was suppose to go today but i didnt. Me n Brys 2 years is on friday :) but he has to work :( so we are hanging out Saturday!! Me and Ashlee have been hangin out a lot :) I love her. Me n Rachel arent talking. i dont think we will ever be friends, but i dont really mind it. And its quite childish how she is mad i didnt save her a seat at the banquet, but how is it possible to save a seat when there are none left? Yeh oh well. But anyways. thats about it...

<33 Meagan

Well I haven't updated in a while so I decided I would!! 

Friday- School. No More Basketball Practice, our season ended Thursday! So Sammy had a lil team party, it was fun. I am goin to miss all those girls soo much! But than me n rachel left sammys at like 8*30, went and got ash, and went to Bry's Hockey game.  They Tied 3-3! Must say it was a fun time tho!! I love hanging out with my Girls :)!! Than after the game i came home and talked on the fone with bry! 

Today- Got up at like 8!Brian called, he left for upnorth till Wed.!! I miss him already :'(! Than my daddy went and got me donuts :-p! Than I went over rachels around 9*30 and went bowling with her! Than we went to her gramps house for a lil bit! Than we came home and she came over and helped me back a lil bit for next weekend :)!!! Next Sunday we leave for Key West! Im so excited!  Than Ashlee came over around 7*30 and we just chilled around the house!! I love just hanging uot and being able to tlak to ash! I love her to death! Dont no where i would be with out her!! Than She left at like 11! Than Kevin called and him and his friend ian stoped by for like 10 mins!! Twas fun!!! But now im tired and about to go to bed :)!!!

Tomorrow- I intend to write my english paper! I need to go shopping. If u wanna do something gimme a call!


<33 Meagan*


I Love You Brian Christopher :-*

an *UpDaTe*

*Basketball Everyday..
*1/2Day Tomorrow
*No School Thursday :-D
*Cedar Pointe FRIDAY! 
*Sweetest Day on Sat. Im not gonna be home:(!! I love yah Bry!
*Today G called me Meagan and i didnt no who she was talking to.
*English is Stressful, to much work!!
*Im sick of Fighting.
*Today i ate squirrel bc mike n bry told me it was deer.
*Brian scored a Goal Yesterday :) GO BABY!
*Im tired.
*Congrats to Rachel n Robbie >>Awws<<
*KEY WEST IN A MONTH!!
-- Thats it!

<33 Meagan

Okay, I think its time for an update!!
*Nothing really new lately.. Just Basketball everyday!! 
*Homecoming was a blast.Everyone looked wonderfull!
(I will post my pictures after i develope my cameras. i still got some pics to take)
*After sucked.. I got sick :-p!!
*My brother gotta deer, its hanging in my back yard.
*School Blows.
*My mommy has to get surgery again :(!!
*I Love Brian Christopher, its almost 2 years.
*I slapped my finger in my locker today and broke my nail, now it just looks messed up! 
*The weather is getting cold,Brr.. I hate it! Only about a month till Key West with Rach:)!
*Cedar Pointe in 12 DaYs :):)!!

--Yeah but that is about it..

<33 Meagan
